meanings.definition: Placed after or at the end of something.
meanings.sent1: The book was postposed on the shelf.
meanings.sent2: The dessert was postposed after dinner.
meanings.sent3: The cat postposed itself on the warm blanket.
meanings.sent4: The stars postposed their appearance until nightfall.
meanings.sent5: The key to success is postposed to hard work.

meanings.definition: Positioned behind or following something else.
meanings.sent1: The postposed chair was hidden behind the table.
meanings.sent2: The postposed car followed the parade.
meanings.sent3: The postposed squirrel surprised the other animals.
meanings.sent4: The postposed shadow elongated as the sun set.
meanings.sent5: The postposed mountain loomed in the distance.
